name: Unreal Gold
description:
This script will install "Unreal Gold" Gog edition with last patch 227i from 
https://www.oldunreal.com/.
During install please let all options by default.

Thanks to the people who helped us play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Multilanguage support (en,fr,de,it,sp)
- This script: "UnrealLinux.sh" will launch the linux version.

files.install: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- install: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG
- patch: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Unreal/unreal_patch_227i_MULTI5.zip
- script: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Unreal/defconfig.sh
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Gold/System/Unreal.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /SILENT
    description: Installing...
    executable: install
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Gold/
    src: patch
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Gold/lin_convenience_libs
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Gold/Help/lin_convenience_libs.tar.bz2
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Gold/System/UnrealLinux.bin
- input_menu:
    description: 'Choose your game''s language:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - int: English
    - frt: French
    - det: German
    - itt: Italian
    - est: Spanish
    preselect: int
- chmodx: script
- execute:
    args: $INPUT_LANG $RESOLUTION_WIDTH $RESOLUTION_HEIGHT
    file: script
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/sh

      cd System

      MESA_EXTENSION_MAX_YEAR=1999

      #LD_LIBRARY_PATH=../lin_convenience_libs

      #export LD_LIBRARY_PATH

      exec ./UnrealLinux.bin -log'
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Gold/UnrealLinux.sh
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Unreal Gold/UnrealLinux.sh
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
